channel.title: Eudora-World [The Return] ~~Aintaro~~
channel.description:
Hello peepz, I wanted to do this a long time ago, But i just didn't have the time to start a decent development thread. I will try to set myself some goals, they will be posted on this development thread.With this thread i'm not trying to recreate runescape in anyway, Everything I'll make will be done MY WAY. I wanted to take it to a different level and see how it turns out. Have fun and wich me luck. :)
For more information : www.eudora-world.com
GOALS:
[b][size=24pt]SKILLS:[/size][/b]
GREEN = FINISHED ORANGE = WORKING ON RED = ON HOLD Mining : 100% Fishing : 60% Prayer : 0% Runecrafting : 0% Smithing : 80% Fletching : 10% [color=orange]Agility : 40%[/color] Cooking : 90% Firemaking : 0% Woodcutting 30% Slayer: 0% Herblore 70% Thieving : 10% Hunter: 10% Player-Owned-House:12%
[b][size=24pt]Minigames:[/size][/b] Lottery:100% Barrows:0% Pest control:0% Duel arena:50% Kill and pray : 0% Dungoneering: 0% Behind the scenes : 0% Hide and kill : 5% Barbarian Assault : 15% Warriors Guild : 10% [color=orange]Stealing Creation : 70%[/color] Clan Wars : 0% Castle wars:10 Christmas Event: 100% Fight pits:100%
[b][size=24pt]Banners:[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2mdkjlc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2nvym9l.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/35hoh89.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/i3hs1i.jpg[/img]
[b][size=24pt]Combat:[/size][/b] Weapon specials : 83% Weapon Timers : 65% Armory and weapon bonus : 98% Magic : 80% Ranging : 95%
[b][size=24pt]Client Interfaces:[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2i12fqh.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i51.tinypic.com/2462lwp.jpg[/img]
[b][size=24pt]WebDevelopment:[/size][/b] -Main page 70% -Forums 5% -Webclient 50%
[b][size=24pt]SERVER AND CLIENT MEDIA:[/size][/b]
[IMG]http://i54.tinypic.com/2wmdydk.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/xda1b8.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i55.tinypic.com/14e3vog.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2iaeqoo.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i56.tinypic.com/353b5fn.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i52.tinypic.com/10zz72q.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/xdb6vc.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2gxpwxu.jpg[/img]
Thanks for reading and I will keep you updated.
6 December 2010
[font=arial black]Finished mining : Timers, Pickaxe, Emotes, Loop, Rocks etc.
Will be showing media soon
8 December 2010
Made a great method that supports all agility courses and exchange systems and emotes.
Pictures comming soon.
8 December 2010 [Later on that day(Alot of studying =/ )]
Worked on fightpits Minigame, The minigame no longer crashes when it search for the winning player.
Players will now gain tokkuls based on the amount of kills they made in the pits.
Player do not lose items dieing in fight pits.
People that disconnect in fight pits will no longer stay in fight pits when they login, they will be removed automaticly to the waiting room.
Added a yell message for the winners.
9 December 2010
Client no more freezes when players change their height level.
Fightpits Interface Made for the waiting room.
Finished Fightpits. 100%
Fixed Melee Following when In combat 100%
10 December 2010
-Been working on the website: http://www.eudora-world.com
-Started forums
-Made a wiki page
-Made some new banners.
-New starting interface completed
-New starter tutorial added
-After countless hours of coding and making interfaces in photoshop, the Stealing creation Part 1 has been finished !
11 december 2010
-After another countless hours of coding today i have found a interface glitch in the pi source witch I successfully fixed !
-Made the waiting rooms with timers
-Made a check for enough players, made players teleport to the mini-game area, with a new interface witch allows them to show the amount of points they gained in the mini-game.
-made the wiki page alive.
-Main website template updated
-Forums very basic at the moment.
-Blogs updated!
For more updates you'll have to check my blog : http://eudora-world.tumblr.com/ [/font]

item.title: Eudora-World [The Return] ~~Aintaro~~
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

I made a update log at the bottom of my thread

I know most people think its nothing special, but give me some time and you’ll see how every piece will fit together

Read full topic

item.title: Eudora-World [The Return] ~~Aintaro~~
item.dc:creator: @Fridder Fridder
item.description:
@Fridder wrote:

Yeah, you can’t trust anybody you find to do things 100% like you plan them to.

Read full topic

item.title: Eudora-World [The Return] ~~Aintaro~~
item.dc:creator: @Ix_Soulcist_xI Soulcist
item.description:
@Ix_Soulcist_xI wrote:

[quote=“Aintaro, post:5, topic:371945”][quote author=Fridder link=topic=468006.msg3421675#msg3421675 date=1291565657]
Damn boy, you’re working on this whole thing by yourself? O_O Good luck and this is extremely awesome I would definitely play this, no doubt, and probably would donate at least $15.
[/quote]

Yes, I realized I better start doing things on my own instead of sharing it with multiple people and realizing that I did all the work at the end.[/quote]
That is a wise choice. We can’t find people whom even attempt to work these days. Anyway, good luck with the development and I hope it turns out to be well.

Read full topic

item.title: Eudora-World [The Return] ~~Aintaro~~
item.dc:creator: @Aintaro Aintaro
item.description:
@Aintaro wrote:

Fridder:

Damn boy, you’re working on this whole thing by yourself? O_O Good luck and this is extremely awesome I would definitely play this, no doubt, and probably would donate at least $15.

Yes, I realized I better start doing things on my own instead of sharing it with multiple people and realizing that I did all the work at the end.

Read full topic

Hello peepz, I wanted to do this a long time ago, But i just didn’t have the time to start a decent development thread. I will try to set myself some goals, they will be posted on this development thread.With this thread i’m not trying to recreate runescape in anyway, Everything I’ll make will be done MY WAY. Pictures comming soon.

8 December 2010 [Later on that day(Alot of studying =/ )]

Players will now gain tokkuls based on the amount of kills they made in the pits.

For more updates you’ll have to check my blog : http://eudora-world.tumblr.com/
